sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message:
This element creates two basic text content blocks next to each other that stack on mobile.

This whole block allows a single link through to another part of the site. No other links can be added.

The image added is revealed from the right when a user hovers or clicks on a element.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message:
This element creates a panel to hold a quote next to a square image.

The content box fades in after the user has scrolled into the area.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This element creates a panel to hold a video.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This element creates a panel hold the left right content

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions:
This section only works when you have 100 characters or less!!!

Remember to check the page before publishing. It may overflow out of the wrapper if you enter too much copy.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: This content is shown above the video. If left blank no content block will be shown.

sub_fields.label: Spacing
sub_fields.name: general_spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Add spacing either side of the panel

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: The video ratio is 19:9. The full size is 1600ps by 900px.

sub_fields.label: Hover Image
sub_fields.name: hover_image_left
sub_fields.instructions: This image should be 300px wide by 450px high

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content_l
sub_fields.instructions: This content is shown above the video. If left blank no content block will be shown.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content_r
sub_fields.instructions: This content is shown above the video. If left blank no content block will be shown.

sub_fields.label: Hover Image
sub_fields.name: hover_image_right
sub_fields.instructions: This image should be 300px wide by 450px high

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This element creates a basic contact form panel

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This creates a "Find Installer" panel. It helps users find nearby installers and directs them to the "Find Installers" page.

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This element allows an existing form to be selected and displayed on the front end.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: Any content you wish to be added above the form should be entered here

sub_fields.label: Message
sub_fields.message: This item moves the standard Wordpress WYSIWYG to this location.
